title: Thanks!
content: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. You can help us by answering some additional questions.

layout.title: Spread the questionnaire, not the virus
layout.content: Help us identify more people with symptoms by sharing this questionnaire. Do you have symptoms of the virus yourself? Then this is extra important. It is possible that you have transferred the virus to others. Send the questionnaire to all the people you've seen in the past two weeks.

layout.title: Adjust symptoms or let us know you’re feeling better
layout.content: Use the link below to edit your answers or let us know you’re feeling better.
